cases.title: Case Studies
cases.subtitle: Successful Projects that Transform Businesses
cases.description: Discover how we have helped companies solve complex challenges through innovative technological solutions.

muelles.title: Truck Detection and ERP Validation
muelles.description: Intelligent system that combines computer vision to detect and classify trucks in real time, integrating with ERP systems to automatically validate deliveries against expected records. Optimizes logistics and reduces discrepancies between scheduled and operational reality.
muelles.challenge: Manual verification of truck arrivals caused delays and discrepancies between scheduled and actual deliveries
muelles.solution: Computer vision system with AI that automatically detects trucks and validates against ERP data in real time
muelles.results: 85% reduction in verification time and 95% accuracy in delivery validation

plagas.title: Pest Detection with Computer Vision
plagas.description: We developed an advanced agricultural monitoring system that uses deep learning algorithms to identify pests and diseases in crops. Through real-time image analysis, our system detects early anomalies, enabling preventive interventions that reduce losses by up to 40% and optimize pesticide use.
plagas.challenge: Traditional pest detection methods require costly and slow manual inspections, causing significant losses due to late detection
plagas.solution: AI system with deep learning algorithms that analyzes crop images 24/7 to automatically detect pests and diseases
plagas.results: 40% reduction in crop losses, 60% optimization in pesticide use and 94% accuracy in early detection

somnolencia.title: Computer Vision in Drowsiness Accident Prevention
somnolencia.description: Vehicle safety system that continuously monitors the driver's alertness state through real-time facial analysis. Detects signs of fatigue such as prolonged blinking, nodding and micro-sleep, activating preventive alerts that can reduce drowsiness accidents by up to 70%.

conteo.title: Box Counting using Computer Vision
conteo.description: We implemented an automated counting system that uses computer vision algorithms to detect, classify and count boxes in warehouses. This solution improves inventory accuracy, reduces human errors and optimizes logistics processes in real time.
conteo.challenge: Currently manual inventory counting is inaccurate, slow and prone to human errors, causing stock discrepancies
conteo.solution: AI system with deep learning algorithms that automatically detects and counts boxes with over 99% accuracy
conteo.results: 99.5% counting accuracy, 90% reduction in inventory time and complete elimination of human errors
